channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: パブリッシャー201社への調査：サブスクリプションの目的は収益の多様化、30%はサブスクリプション収益の伸びが10%未満、解約は迫り来る問題（Brian Morrissey/The Rebooting）
item.description:
Brian Morrissey / The Rebooting:
A survey of 201 publishers: the goal of subscriptions is to diversify revenue, 30% are seeing <10% growth in subscription revenue, and churn is a looming issue  —  Today, I'm releasing The Rebooting's second research project.  With partnership from BlueConic, I surveyed over 200 publishers …

item.title: 他のフェミニスト・ブロゴスフィアよりも長かったJezebelの閉鎖によって、アメリカにおける明確なフェミニスト・メディアの時代は終わったようだ（Moira Donegan/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Moira Donegan / The Guardian:
The era of explicitly feminist media in the US appears to be over with the closure of Jezebel, which outlasted the rest of the feminist blogosphere  —  Websites like Jezebel revived feminism, showing the internet might have a re-radicalizing effect.  Who will carry the torch?  —  Jezebel is dead.

item.title: 女優のジャスティン・ベイトマンが、SAG-AFTRAの暫定協定のAI条項を非難し、組合員は「もう働きたくない場合」だけ承認すべきだと語った（Carly Thomas/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Carly Thomas / The Hollywood Reporter:
Actress Justine Bateman slams the AI provisions in SAG-AFTRA's tentative deal, saying union members should only approve it “if they don't want to work anymore”  —  The actress-writer-filmmaker said union members should only approve the deal “if they don't want to work anymore.”

item.title: アラスカ、ミネソタ、ウィチタ、フィラデルフィア、シカゴ、イリノイ州スプリングフィールドにあるプレス・フォワードの最初の6つの地方支部とその主要な資金提供者を見てみよう。
item.description:
Sophie Culpepper / Nieman Lab:
A look at Press Forward's first six local chapters and their leading funders in Alaska, Minnesota, Wichita, Philadelphia, Chicago, and Springfield, Illinois  —  The coalition announced its first six local chapters, and their leading funders, last week.  —  When a coalition of funders led …

item.title: 情報筋DMGTはカタールのグループとの交渉を打ち切り、単独でテレグラフ・メディアの入札を準備中。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Sources: DMGT is preparing to bid for Telegraph Media on its own, after ending talks with a Qatari group over fears UK would oppose investors from the region  —  Daily Mail owner is drawing up plan to fund bid on its own  —  Lord Rothermere has dropped plans to use Qatari cash to help fund …

item.title: NPR/エジソンリサーチ：13歳以上のアメリカ人の48％が毎日話し言葉コンテンツを聴いており、1日のリスニング時間の31％を占め、2014年から55％増加している（Lori Lewis/Inside Radio）
item.description:
Lori Lewis / Inside Radio:
NPR/Edison Research: a record 48% of Americans aged 13+ listen to spoken word content daily, accounting for 31% of their daily listening time, up 55% since 2014  —  Broadcast radio talk shows still dominate in the car, but overall, new research finds podcasting accounts for a growing amount …

item.title: SAG-AFTRAの合意は、スタジオに対し、生前の俳優や死亡した俳優のデジタル・レプリカを作成する前に同意を得ること、その使用を公表すること、そしてその対価を俳優に支払うことを要求するものである（Rolling Stone誌）。
item.description:
Rolling Stone:
SAG-AFTRA's deal would require studios to get consent before making digital replicas of living and deceased actors, disclose their use, and pay actors for them  —  The union's national board voted Friday to accept the new deal with Hollywood studios … The SAG-AFTRA national board voted Friday …

item.title: 国境なき記者団と16のパートナーが「AIとジャーナリズムに関するパリ憲章」を発表、AIを扱うジャーナリストの倫理と原則の定義に貢献（国境なき記者団）
item.description:
Reporters Without Borders:
Reporters Without Borders and 16 partners unveil the Paris Charter on AI and Journalism to help define ethics and principles for journalists working with AI  —  The first of its kind, the Paris Charter on AI and Journalism defines ethics and principles that journalists …

item.title: SAG-AFTRA全国理事会、大手スタジオとの新契約を86％の賛成票で承認、批准のため会員に送付（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
The SAG-AFTRA national board approves its new contract with the major studios with an 86% approval vote, sending it to membership for ratification  —  The official approval was announced by the guild at a press conference Friday afternoon, which finally got started at around 3:20 p.m. after an 80-minute delay.

item.title: TumblrのAMAで、マット・マレンウェグは、オートマティック社でスタッフの大半を他の分野にシフトした後のTumblrの将来、マネタイズなどについて語った（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
In an AMA on Tumblr, Matt Mullenweg spoke about Tumblr's future after shifting the majority of its staff to other areas at Automattic, monetization, and more  —  This week, WordPress.com owner Matt Mullenweg confirmed his company would be shifting the majority of Tumblr's workforce to other areas …

item.title: ライオンズゲート、第2四半期の売上は$1.01億ドル（予想$9.9億ドル）、Starzのラテンアメリカと英国からの撤退を含むリストラ費用により$8.879億ドルの純損失（Etan Vlessing/The Hollywood Reporter
item.description:
Etan Vlessing / The Hollywood Reporter:
Lionsgate reports Q2 revenue of $1.01B, vs. $990M est., and a net loss of $887.9M due to restructuring charges, including Starz leaving Latin America and the UK  —  The Hollywood studio released its latest financial results amid strategic talks to spin off its studio division or Starz streaming platform.

item.title: ムーディーズは、俳優、脚本家、監督との新たなギルド契約により、スタジオは年間4億5000万ドルから6億ドル以上のコストを負担することになるが、信用リスクにはならないと推定している（Jill Goldsmith/Deadline）
item.description:
Jill Goldsmith / Deadline:
Moody's estimates new guild contracts with actors, writers, and directors will cost studios upwards of $450M to $600M per year, and won't pose a credit risk  —  - A24's Nicolas Cage-Starring ‘Dream Scenario’ Opens In Limited Release With Spoof 'It's A Wonderful Knife', Doc ‘Orlando, My Political Biography’ - Specialty Preview

item.title: LinkedInの研究者によると、民間のスパイ企業ブラック・キューブが偽のペルソナを作成し、偽の求人情報を使ってハンガリーのジャーナリストや活動家を標的にした（Raphael Satter/Reuters）
item.description:
Raphael Satter / Reuters:
A researcher for LinkedIn says private spy company Black Cube created fake personas that used bogus job postings to target Hungarian journalists and activists  —  Private spy firm Black Cube was behind a hidden video campaign that used LinkedIn to target Hungarian activists and journalists leading …

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズの弁護士が、NYTの従業員のうち何人がハマスと内通しているのかとコットンに質問した後、トム・コットン上院議員を「偽情報と扇動的なレトリック」で非難した（Dominick Mastrangelo/The Hill）。
item.description:
Dominick Mastrangelo / The Hill:
A New York Times attorney blasts Senator Tom Cotton for “disinformation and incendiary rhetoric” after Cotton asked how many NYT employees embedded with Hamas  —  The New York Times sent a scathing rebuke in response to a letter from Sen. Tom Cotton (R-Ark.) …

item.title: インド、コンテンツ評価委員会を設置し、政府があらゆるオンラインクリエイターやニュースプラットフォームを規制する放送・ストリーミング規則を提案（Aditya Kalra/Reuters）
item.description:
Aditya Kalra / Reuters:
India proposes broadcast and streaming rules that would set up content evaluation committees and let the government regulate any online creator or news platform  —  India on Friday introduced a new draft broadcasting law to regulate the sector that will also apply to streaming giants such as Netflix …
